text: Kenneth Neil Waddell (born September 11, 1953) is a Democratic member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/117806/kenneth- waddell#.VWvg3mTBzGc Waddell represents the 46th district. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Democrats Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:1953 births Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Ken Waddell
